Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (pp = 1; pp <= pattern.Length; ++pp) {  	int thisRow = pp % 2;  	int prevRow = 1 - thisRow;  	table [thisRow' 0] = pp * CostInsert;  	for (int pi = 1; pi <= input.Length; ++pi) {  		decimal cost = (input [pi - 1] == pattern [pp - 1]) ? 0 : CostReplace;  		decimal minCostPi = table [thisRow' pi - 1] + CostDelete;  		decimal minCost2 = table [prevRow' pi - 1] + cost;  		decimal minCostPp = table [prevRow' pi] + CostInsert;  		table [thisRow' pi] = Math.Min (Math.Min (minCostPp' minCostPi)' minCost2);  	}  }
The following statement contains a magic number: return table [1 - (pp % 2)' input.Length];
